LoginPage.title: Welcome back!

LoggedHome.SubscribeContainer: Unlock All Courses on the Platform!

SignUpStages.0: Welcome to English OnBoard!. Before the Leassons, let's Sign up your datas to personalize your Learning experience.
SignUpStages.1: Let's go! Select the one that represents your English level.
SignUpStages.1.3: I can talk easyly in english
SignUpStages.2: Why do you like to study english?
SignUpStages.3: Wich ability you want to improve?
SignUpStages.4: What is your learning most difficulty?
SignUpStages.4.4: I have difficulty to pronounce some words
SignUpStages.4.6: I have difficulty to meet new study partners
SignUpStages.6: How much time do you want to study everyday
SignUpStages.7: Well done! Your learning routine is done! Now we'll create your account to save your progress
SignUpStages.8: First of all, how can we call you?
SignUpStages.9.01: Now whats is your Email Adress?
